name: Shell Rimula R4 Plus 15W-40

globalDocs.name: Rimula R4 Plus 15W-40 (CI-4 plus) - India EN TDG V1.1 09-Dec-2022

localDocs.name: Rimula R4 Plus 15W-40 (CI-4 plus) - India India EN 140006501563 EHS V1.0 21-NOV-2022

marketing: Shell Rimula R4 Plus adapts and protects under full range of pressures and temperatures found in modern engines. It delivers excellent soot and viscosity control, outstanding protection against wear and exceptional versatility for multiple engine makes.
